title: Project Planning and Requirements Gathering
description: Define the project scope, objectives, and requirements through stakeholder interviews, market research, and analysis of existing systems.

title: Data Integration and ETL
description: Develop strategies and mechanisms for integrating data from various sources, including port terminals and logistics facilities.

title: Database Design and Implementation
description: Design and implement the database schema to store and manage operational and financial data for global port terminals and inland logistics facilities. The database should support efficient data retrieval, updates, and analytics for near-real-time visibility. Consider data partitioning, indexing, caching strategies (such as Redis or Memcached), and query optimization techniques for optimal performance. Ensure data integrity, security, and compliance with industry standards and regulations applicable to the logistics and maritime industries. Additionally, consider the use of a distributed database system such as Google's Spanner or Amazon's DynamoDB to handle the global scale of the project. To enhance the review process, it would be beneficial to include examples of similar projects that leverage these technologies for scalability and performance. Suggest potential solutions for handling large volumes of data and ensuring low latency in real-time visibility.

title: User Interface and Reporting
description: Design and develop the user interface for data visualization, reporting, and analytics.

title: Security and Access Control (v2) - Update for Review
description: Update the current implementation of security measures, including authentication, authorization, and data encryption. Implement Role-Based Access Control (RBAC) for secure user management and ensure compliance with industry standards such as GDPR and HIPAA where applicable. Suggested improvements include a multi-factor authentication system and regular security audits.

title: Deployment and DevOps
description: Set up the deployment infrastructure, including continuous integration, continuous deployment, and monitoring.

title: Testing and Quality Assurance
description: Develop and implement a comprehensive testing strategy, including unit tests, integration tests, and end-to-end tests.

title: Documentation and Training
description: Create comprehensive documentation for the system, including user guides, technical documentation, and training materials.
